raw_data.description: Comprehensive sales transaction data containing customer information, product details, pricing, and revenue metrics for Intersight product sales across different markets and time periods.
raw_data.business_purpose: Track sales performance, analyze revenue patterns, monitor customer segments, and evaluate market penetration across different verticals and geographies.

CUSTOMER_NAME.meaning: Unique identifier for each customer account
CUSTOMER_NAME.description: Customer identification code used for tracking individual customer transactions and relationships
CUSTOMER_NAME.business_context: Primary customer identifier for sales tracking and customer relationship management

LEVEL_1_NAME.meaning: Primary geographic region where the customer is located
LEVEL_1_NAME.description: Top-level geographic division (Americas, EMEA, APJC) for regional sales analysis and territory management
LEVEL_1_NAME.business_context: Used for regional sales performance analysis and territory planning

CONTRACT_DURATION.meaning: Duration of the service contract in months
CONTRACT_DURATION.description: Length of the subscription or service agreement, typically ranging from 12 to 60 months
CONTRACT_DURATION.business_context: Critical for revenue recognition, customer lifetime value calculation, and renewal planning

YEAR.meaning: Calendar year when the transaction occurred
YEAR.description: Year of the sales transaction for temporal analysis and year-over-year comparisons
YEAR.business_context: Used for trend analysis, annual planning, and historical performance tracking

FISCAL_QUARTER_ID.meaning: Fiscal quarter identifier for the transaction
FISCAL_QUARTER_ID.description: Fiscal quarter (e.g., 20212 = 2021 Q2) for quarterly reporting and seasonal analysis
FISCAL_QUARTER_ID.business_context: Essential for quarterly business reviews and seasonal trend analysis

QUARTER.description: Formatted quarter name (e.g., '2021-Q2') for reporting and analysis
QUARTER.business_context: Used in reports and dashboards for easy quarter identification

QUARTER_NAME.description: Abbreviated quarter name (e.g., 'Q2') for compact display
QUARTER_NAME.business_context: Used in charts and compact displays

SHORT_QUARTER_NAME.business_context: Used in user interfaces and reports

SCMS_NAME.description: Customer segment based on size and type (Enterprise, Commercial, etc.)
SCMS_NAME.business_context: Used for segment-specific sales strategies and resource allocation

TOP_VERTICAL_MARKET_NAME.meaning: Primary industry vertical of the customer
TOP_VERTICAL_MARKET_NAME.description: Main industry sector of the customer (e.g., Financial Services, Healthcare, Technology)
TOP_VERTICAL_MARKET_NAME.business_context: Critical for industry-specific sales strategies and market penetration analysis

DETAIL_VERTICAL_MARKET_NAME.description: Specific sub-industry or vertical market segment for targeted analysis
DETAIL_VERTICAL_MARKET_NAME.business_context: Used for highly targeted sales and marketing campaigns

COUNTRY.meaning: Country where the customer is located
COUNTRY.description: Country name for geographic analysis and compliance requirements
COUNTRY.business_context: Used for geographic sales analysis, compliance, and local market strategies

IntersightLicenseTier.description: License tier determines feature access and support level (Essentials, Advantage, Premier)
IntersightLicenseTier.business_context: Determines pricing, features, and support level - critical for revenue optimization

IntersightConsumption.meaning: How the Intersight product is consumed
IntersightConsumption.description: Consumption model indicates how customers use the product (SaaS, vApp, On-Premises)
IntersightConsumption.business_context: Critical for understanding customer preferences and deployment strategies

IntersightProduct.description: The specific Intersight product or service being sold (e.g., Intersight Core, Intersight Assist)
IntersightProduct.business_context: Product-specific analysis for feature adoption and product development

IntersightEnterpriseAgreement.description: Whether the customer has an enterprise agreement (EA) or is on a transactional basis
IntersightEnterpriseAgreement.business_context: Affects pricing, terms, and customer relationship management

QUANTITY.description: Quantity of licenses or units sold in the transaction
QUANTITY.business_context: Direct revenue driver and indicator of customer size and needs

LIST_PRICE.description: Published list price per license before any discounts or negotiations
LIST_PRICE.business_context: Baseline for pricing analysis and discount calculations

ACTUAL_BOOKINGS.meaning: Actual revenue booked from the transaction
ACTUAL_BOOKINGS.description: Final revenue amount after all discounts, negotiations, and adjustments
ACTUAL_BOOKINGS.business_context: Primary revenue metric for financial reporting and performance analysis

BASE_PRICE.description: Base product price before add-on services, support, or other enhancements
BASE_PRICE.business_context: Used for product margin analysis and pricing strategy

ANNUALIZED_MONTHLY_RECURRING_REVENUE.description: Monthly recurring revenue annualized for the contract period
ANNUALIZED_MONTHLY_RECURRING_REVENUE.business_context: Key metric for SaaS business model analysis and valuation

TRANSACTIONAL_MONTHLY_RECURRING_REVENUE.description: Monthly recurring revenue for this specific transaction
TRANSACTIONAL_MONTHLY_RECURRING_REVENUE.business_context: Used for monthly revenue tracking and forecasting

QuantityAdj.description: Quantity adjusted for promotions, bundles, or special pricing arrangements
QuantityAdj.business_context: Used for accurate revenue calculations and reporting

QTY_IN_SUBS_MONTHS.meaning: Total subscription months in the contract
QTY_IN_SUBS_MONTHS.description: Total number of months covered by the subscription (Quantity Ã— Contract Duration)
QTY_IN_SUBS_MONTHS.business_context: Used for subscription value calculations and renewal planning

revenue_metrics.total_revenue: Sum of ACTUAL_BOOKINGS across all transactions

customer_metrics.customers_by_region: Count of customers grouped by LEVEL_1_NAME
customer_metrics.customers_by_segment: Count of customers grouped by SCMS_NAME
customer_metrics.customers_by_industry: Count of customers grouped by TOP_VERTICAL_MARKET_NAME

temporal_metrics.quarterly_revenue: Sum of ACTUAL_BOOKINGS grouped by QUARTER
temporal_metrics.yearly_revenue: Sum of ACTUAL_BOOKINGS grouped by YEAR

pricing_rules.list_price_validation: LIST_PRICE should be greater than or equal to ACTUAL_BOOKINGS
pricing_rules.contract_duration_validation: CONTRACT_DURATION should be between 12 and 60 months
